targetLine.text: Did you get kicked out of another boarding school? Damn it, Lorraine, do you know how much perfectly good dough I've blown on this no-good kid of yours, huh? On all three of 'em?!
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part II

contextAfter.text: What the hell do you care?! We can afford it! The least we can do with all that money is provide a better life for our children.
Hold on one second. Let's get this straight. Marty is your kid, not mine. And all the money in the world wouldn't do jack shit for that lazy bum!
Stop it, Biff. Just stop it!

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
